name: Name,Place,Animal,Thing
0:
”Alexa, play Name, Place Animal, Thing”
”Alexa, open Name, Place Animal, Thing”
”Alexa, start Name, Place Animal, Thing”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: name place animal thing
des:
Name, Place, Animal, Thing is a fun mind game where Alexa challenges you to write down as many (1) names, (2) places, (3) animals, and (4) things that start with the letter Alexa randomly selects. This game is lots of fun to play for kids and adults alike and is great for all ages.

We send a huge thank you for enabling the game on your Amazon Alexa speaker and playing! If you enjoyed Name, Place, Animal, Thing, please take a moment to leave a 5 star review and tell your friends =)
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
